tool_description: Detects and categorizes delivery exceptions such as failed attempts, weather delays, address issues, and other delivery problems that require attention.
error_messages: Invalid status format: Current status must be a non-empty string.
No tracking events: At least one tracking event must be provided.
Invalid delivery attempts: Delivery attempts must be a non-negative integer.
Invalid expected delivery date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format.
Unsupported carrier: Carrier code must be supported (UPS, FEDEX, USPS, DHL, etc.).
Invalid max attempts: Maximum attempts must be between 1 and 10.
usage: Provide current package status, tracking events, delivery attempts, expected delivery date, and carrier code to detect potential delivery exceptions.

has_exception.description: Whether a delivery exception was detected

exception_type.description: Type of exception detected (failed_delivery, weather_delay, address_issue, etc.)

recommended_actions.description: Recommended actions to resolve the exception

customer_impact.description: Assessment of impact on customer experience
